pageProduct.name: Sukin For Men Shaving Gel 225ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Say hello to our natural Men's Range, formulated specifically for Men's skin! Our natural revitalising Shaving Gel For Men has Tasmanian Pepper for soothing and Baobab Extract to lubricate skin for a close and comfortable shave. Sesame Oil and Chamomile help to hydrate and soothe skin, leaving it fresh and smooth. A masculine blend of Cinnamon and Citrus refreshes the senses

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes and rinse immediately if contact occurs. If irritation occurs rinse immediately and discontinue use. For external use only.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Carrageenan, Hydrolyzed Adansonia Digitata Extract (Baobab), Tasmannia Lanceolata Fruit/Leaf Extract (Tasmanian Pepper), Artemisia Absinthium Extract (Absinthe), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract (Chamomile), Cinnamomum Zeylanicum Bark Oil (Cinnamon), Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Oil, Piper Nigrum (Pepper) Seed Oil, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Citric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene*, Cinnamal*. *Natural Component of Essential Oil

Directions

Apply a small amount to moist hands and lather with water. Gently massage into skin and shave. Rinse thoroughly with water. Use when shaving once or twice daily.
